page.title: 05Life Of A Working Mum
page.content: The day begins at 7.30am when I awake the children,prepare the breakfast cereal and toast then start my housework including the preparation of the evening meal.Then go to work at a supermarket as a checkout operator calculating the cost of peoples purchase.When I return home at 5.00pm we have our evening meal.The children then go to their evening activities (swimming,iceskating,brownies & guides depending on the night of the week) at 8.30pm the children have a light snack then go to bed.We watch television have a snack then go to bed by 11.00pm.
